MENU_PROMPT: What would you like to order today?
CART_EMPTY_OR_ERROR: 🛒 Your cart is empty or an error occurred
CART_EMPTY_ORDER: 🛒 Your cart is empty. Add items before sending order
ORDER_SEND_PROBLEM: ❌ There was a problem sending the order. Please try again
UNEXPECTED_ERROR: ❌ An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
ORDER_CONFIRMATION_THANKS: Thank you for your order! We'll contact you soon to confirm details
CART_EMPTY_MESSAGE: Add some delicious items from our menu!
WELCOME_BACK: Hello {name}, great to see you again! 🎉
WHAT_TO_ORDER_TODAY: What would you like to order today?
WELCOME_HELP_MESSAGE: I'm here to help you order our delicious traditional Yemeni products
PLEASE_ENTER_NAME: To get started, please tell me your full name:
ERROR_TRY_START_AGAIN: Sorry, there was an error. Please try again with /start
NAME_TOO_SHORT: Please enter your full name (at least 2 characters):
PLEASE_SHARE_PHONE: Now, please share your phone number so we can contact you about your order:
SESSION_EXPIRED: Session expired. Please start again with /start
HOW_RECEIVE_ORDER: How would you like to receive your order?
ENTER_VALID_PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number:
PICKUP_CHOSEN: Perfect! You chose pickup. We'll contact you to arrange pickup time
WHAT_TO_ORDER: What would you like to order?
DELIVERY_CHOSEN: Great! You chose delivery. There's a delivery fee of 5 NIS
PROVIDE_DELIVERY_ADDRESS: Please provide your full delivery address:
ADDRESS_TOO_SHORT: Please provide a full delivery address (at least 10 characters):
DELIVERY_ADDRESS_SAVED: Thank you! Your delivery address has been saved 🚚
ONBOARDING_CANCELLED: Registration cancelled. You can start again anytime with /start
UNKNOWN_COMMAND: Sorry, I didn't understand that command. Please follow the instructions
UNKNOWN_MESSAGE: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Please provide the information I requested
ADMIN_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred. Please try again or contact support
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_CLASSIC: Classic Kubaneh - Traditional rich Yemeni bread
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_SEEDED: Seeded Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with sesame and cumin seeds
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_HERB: Herb Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with aromatic herbs
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_AROMATIC: Aromatic Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with special spices
PRODUCT_SAMNEH_SMOKED: Smoked Samneh - Clarified butter with rich smoky flavor
PRODUCT_SAMNEH_NOT_SMOKED: Not Smoked Samneh - Pure and natural clarified butter
PRODUCT_RED_BISBAS: Red Bisbas - Traditional Yemeni spicy sauce
PRODUCT_HILBEH: Hilbeh - Traditional Yemeni sauce from fenugreek seeds
PRODUCT_HAWAIJ_SOUP: Hawaij for Soup - Yemeni spice blend for soup
PRODUCT_HAWAIJ_COFFEE: Hawaij for Coffee - Yemeni spice blend for coffee
PRODUCT_WHITE_COFFEE: White Coffee - Traditional Yemeni hot and sweet drink
MENU_ERROR_OCCURRED: An error occurred. Please try again
AVAILABILITY_CHECK_ERROR_GENERIC: Error checking availability. Please try again
ANALYTICS_ERROR_REPORT: Error: Could not generate analytics report.
ADMIN_NO_PENDING_ORDERS: ✅ No pending orders! All caught up.
ADMIN_NO_ACTIVE_ORDERS: ✅ No active orders at the moment.
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_PROMPT:
Please enter the Order ID to update (the small number inside the "ID ..." parentheses).
For example, if the line reads '#ORD-20250705... (ID 20) - John', you should send 20.
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_NOT_FOUND: ❌ Order not found. Make sure to send the numeric ID shown in the list.
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_TRY_ANOTHER: ❌ Order not found. Try another ID.
DELIVERY_METHOD_PROMPT: How would you like to receive your order?
CONFIRM_CLEAR_CART: 🗑️ Clear Cart 🗑️ Are you sure you want to clear your cart?
DELIVERY_ADDRESS_REQUIRED: 📍 Delivery Address Required 📍 To continue with delivery, please provide your full delivery address:
DELIVERY_ADDRESS_PROMPT: 📍 Enter Delivery Address 📍 Please provide your full delivery address (street, number, city):
ORDER_PREVIEW_CONFIRM_PROMPT: Are you sure you want to send this order?
